title: Pool With a view, 3Bedrooms,3baths, South loop, restaurants,cta, parks
posting_body: ['PROPERTY INFO', 'ID: 147463263', 'Rent: $6,722 / Month', 'Beds: 3', 'Bath: 3', 'Pet: Pet Friendly', 'Parking:: attached garage', 'Live on the top floor in the Penthouse 3 bedroom 3 bath .', ' 1739 sq ft.  2 primary Bedrooms with attached bathrooms.', ' Floor to ceiling windows.', ' Top floor sky deck, gym, and community lounge and kitchen space available.', 'Pool, hot tub, steam, sauna, and grills, Dog run, and more.', 'call me for a tour at 219-299-9042  ask for Apollo', 'If smart homes had IQ scores, this South Loop gem would rate as genius.', 'While many new construction apartments have smart home implementation, this 2019 new building’s technology stands out.', 'Residents can enjoy a fully integrated technically advanced lifestyle with pre-wired lights, outlets, Nest thermostats, and motion sensors.', 'This technology is not only cool, but since it is also connected throughout the common areas, it saves on energy use and costs.', 'Nestled in South Loop and surrounded by green space, this urban oasis offers luxury apartments and modern conveniences.', 'Upon stepping into each apartment home, you’ll find floor-to-ceiling windows, gleaming wood-grain flooring, quartz countertops, and smart USB outlets.', 'If you need more space to entertain, The Paragon offers many amenities, including a rooftop sky lounge, resort-style pool with cabanas, and a clubroom with billiards.', 'Work up a sweat in the expansive fitness center with stunning city views or relax in the on-site spa with whirlpool, sauna, and steam.', 'Perfectly situated to have all your needs met, you’re within a 10-minute walk of grocery stores, shopping, and dining, in addition to various public transportation routes.', 'Enjoy the lake, Grant Park, and museum campus, which are all just steps outside your front door.', 'Four-legged companions can enjoy the private dog park and spa, although breed restrictions apply.', 'On-site parking is available at an additional cost.', 'FEATURES', 'Balcony-None', 'Central Air-Yes', 'Dishwasher-All', 'Dogs-No Weight Limit', 'Fitness Center', 'Flooring-Hardwood Only', 'Laundry- W/D In Unit', 'Luxury Property', 'New Property', 'Pool-Outdoor', 'Security-24 Hour Doorman', 'Smoking-No', 'Stove-Gas', 'Apollo Russell', '(219) 299-9042', 'HotSpot Rentals(License #481.011892)', 'Disclaimer: Photos may not be of exact unit available and may be of various model units and various vacant units.', 'Apartment availability and lease terms may vary.', 'Pricing, availability, and specials are subject to change at any time and without notice.', 'Please note that the price may be net effective of a special or concession that the building is currently running.', 'Information is believed to be accurate, however, is subject to errors and omissions.', 'HotSpot Rentals services the following neighborhoods: South Loop, Printers Row, Near North, River North, Gold Coast, West Loop, Fulton River District, West Loop Gate, The Loop, Streeterville, Lakeshore East, New East Side, Old Town, Medical District, University Village, Near North, River West, Lincoln Park South, Lakeview, Uptown, Ukrainian Village, Wicker Park, Edgewater, Ravenswood, Bronzeville, Logan Square']
